mapper.select: SELECT a.activ_uid, a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, t.ticket_last_cost, a.activ_pic FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid and not t.ticket_last_cost IN (0) GROUP BY a.activ_uid;

SELECT a.activ_uid, a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, t.ticket_last_cost, t.ticket_first_cost, a.activ_pic FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.ticket_uid and not t.ticket_first_cost IN (0) and not t.ticket_last_cost IN (0) GROUP BY a.activ_uid;

SELECT a.activ_uid, a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, t.ticket_last_cost, AVG(r.review_star) 'review_star', a.activ_pic FROM activ a, ticket t, book b, review r WHERE a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid and t.ticket_uid = b.ticket_uid and b.book_uid = r.book_uid and not t.ticket_last_cost IN (0) GROUP BY t.ticket_uid ORDER BY AVG(r.review_star) DESC LIMIT 0, 10;

SELECT a.activ_uid, a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, t.ticket_last_cost, a.activ_pic FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.ticket_uid and not t.ticket_last_cost IN (0) and not t.ticket_last_cost IN (0) and a.activ_name like (#{activ_name}) and a.activ_loc like (#{activ_loc}) GROUP BY a.activ_uid;

SELECT a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, a.activ_info, a.activ_shop_info, a.activ_pic, a.activ_tel, a.activ_uid, t.ticket_uid, t.ticket_name, t.ticket_first_cost, t.ticket_last_cost, t.ticket_info FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid and a.activ_uid = #{activ_uid};

SELECT r.review_star FROM review r, book b, ticket t, activ a, member m WHERE r.book_uid = b.book_uid and b.member_uid = m.member_uid and b.ticket_uid = t.ticket_uid and t.activ_uid = a.activ_uid and a.activ_uid = #{activ_uid} ORDER BY r.review_uid DESC;

SELECT r.review_uid, r.review_title, r.review_star, r.review_content, r.review_id, m.member_uid, m.member_id, m.member_pic FROM review r, book b, ticket t, activ a, member m WHERE r.book_uid = b.book_uid and b.member_uid = m.member_uid and b.ticket_uid = t.ticket_uid and t.activ_uid = a.activ_uid and a.activ_uid = #{activ_uid} ORDER BY r.review_uid DESC LIMIT #{writePages}, #{page};
SELECT member_name, member_tel FROM member WHERE member_uid = #{member_uid};
SELECT a.activ_name, t.ticket_name, t.ticket_last_cost FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid and t.ticket_uid = #{ticket_uid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_date, book_member_cnt, book_cost, book_name, book_member_name, book_member_tel, member_uid, ticket_uid) VALUES (now(), #{dto.book_member_cnt}, #{dto.book_cost}, #{dto.book_name}, #{dto.book_member_name}, #{dto.book_member_tel}, #{member_uid}, #{dto.ticket_uid});
mapper.select: SELECT a.activ_name, t.ticket_name FROM activ a, ticket t WHERE a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid AND t.ticket_uid = #{ticket_uid}
SELECT b.book_uid FROM book b, member m, ticket t, activ a WHERE b.member_uid = #{member_uid} and b.ticket_uid = t.ticket_uid and t.activ_uid = a.activ_uid ORDER BY b.book_uid desc LIMIT 1;
